question: The "Diego de Ocampo Mountain" is located in which country?
explanation: The Diego de Ocampo Mountain is located in the island country of the Dominican Republic in the Hispaniola Islands of the Greater Antilles Archipelago in the West Indies-Caribbean region. This mountain is the highest summit in the Cordillera Septentrional Mountain Range. It is bounded by the Cibao Valley, part of the Cordillera Central. The forest of this mountain is dense and the trail is narrow and very steep. It forms part of the Pico Diego de Ocampo natural monument.
